_comment: Future refrence use the design below to add more projects(REMOVE the demo comment on Project.jsx if used)
title: Store Database
description: This is a straightforward project designed to illustrate key store operations, including inventory management and customer interactions.

title: Library Managment
description: This project demonstrates the application of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles to develop a library system for managing the check-in and check-out of books and videos.

title: Algorithms
description: This project showcases my understanding of algorithm design and demonstrates how to appropriately apply each algorithm to its respective scenario and use case.
